TopicTitle: Another new face on the forums

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Rocketeers,

Now that this forum has returned from the ashes I'm registering for the first time. I got hooked on this game when it was suggested from a friend of mine and am thoroughly addicted. I've had the pleasure of only using since 0.19 and have kept it stock to this point, no mechjeb either.

Currently I'm just fiddling with station construction and planning the first "beyond-minmus" excursions.

Oh, and if anyone has a fix for wobbly space stations/docked components, please feel free to pass it on! Its driving me crazy!

Beyond that, nice to meet you all, and happy launching,

B202

Welcome

If your space station is wobbling, turn off SAS, or if you use multiple probes they could be causing it.
